alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 2:41PM EST until January 26 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos and Southern Coos Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
